enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding options to the Options instance, with addOptions being a bulk addition of multiple options.
addOptions also handles the addition of OptionGroups, similar to addOptionGroup, making it a good setup method for testing addOptions.
hasOption can be used to verify that the options added by addOptions are correctly present in the Options instance.
getOptions can be used to retrieve the list of options and verify that the correct options have been added by addOptions.
getOptionGroups can be used to verify that the OptionGroups added by addOptions are correctly present in the Options instance.
